7.1 #Labs.Avatar Avatar

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

WORK IN PROGRESS

.MY_AVATAR_AVATAR {
  .avatar();
}
Example
Markup 
<a href="#"><span class="MY_AVATAR_AVATAR"></span></a>

7.2 #Labs.SlashedIcons Slashed icons

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

WORK IN PROGRESS Note: slashed icons automatically import font awesome .fa-fw ruleset for fixed width.

Mockup: 

.ALT_ARROWS_ICON_SLASHED {
  .getFaIcon('arrows-alt');
  .fa-3x;
  .fa-slashed();
}
Example
Markup 
<div class="display-flex">
    <i class="FACEBOOK_ICON_SLASHED"></i>
    <i class="ALT_ARROWS_ICON_SLASHED"></i>
</div>
Source: documented-components/labs.less, line 42

7.3 #Labs.LoadingWidget Loading widget/alert

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup 

.MY_LOADING_ALERT {
  .loading(); // default mode, color is @black and label is "Loading"
}

.MY_DANGER_ALERT {
  .loading('Warning: wait for operation to complete'; @red);
}

.MY_WAIT_ALERT {
  .button-danger();
  .loading('Wait for the app to sync'; @white);
}
Example
Markup 
<section class="display-flex">
    <div class="MY_LOADING_ALERT"><!--
        --><i></i><i></i><i></i>
    </div>
    <div class="MY_DANGER_ALERT"><!--
        --><i></i><i></i><i></i>
    </div>
    <div class="MY_WAIT_ALERT"><!--
        --><i></i><i></i><i></i>
    </div>
</section>
Source: documented-components/labs.less, line 105
